synopsis.text: What starts as an ordinary life for Yakumo Fuuji takes a drastic turn when he becomes the immortal servant of Pai, the last surviving member of the three-eyed Sanjiyan race. In a twist of fate, Pai absorbs Yakumo's soul to save him from an untimely death, binding their destinies together. Now, they embark on a perilous journey to find a statue that could make Pai human again. Along the way, they face formidable adversaries, including the powerful Benares, the servant of the dark lord Shiva. Complicating matters further, Pai's split personality oscillates between endearing innocence and destructive force, while dark secrets from her past begin to resurface. Amidst these challenges, an unexpected romance blossoms, adding another layer of complexity to their quest.
